message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $125 right now. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I was thinking more along the lines of $165. This is my bottom line for the product, and I'm confident you'll find it worth it.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $165 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $125.  It's the best I can do right now. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I really need to make a profit on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $155. This is my final compromise.
